unit: Unit 9 | Inference for Quantitative Data: Slopes
title: T-Statistic and P-Value: Use the Clues
question_text:
Here are the clues:
Type of Test: $t$-test for slope of LSRL Type of Alternative Hypothesis: Two-Sided Equation of LSRL: $\hat { y } =25.87-3.18x$ Standard Error of Slope: $1.72$ Number of Observations: $12$
Find the $t$-statistic and $p$-value for this test.
